title: 不创建对象的方式导出Excel，cell 值是空字符串导出后的excel无法使用公式计算 fx=K15+K17
body:
例如：fx=K15+K17
k15
k16
k17   0.5

结果 #VALUE!
author: shifefiei

comments.body:
> 直接放`null`试试

好使，已解决

satisfaction_conditions: Ensure exported empty numeric cells are interpreted as numeric values rather than text
Maintain formula compatibility without requiring object creation
Handle cell null/empty state in a way Excel recognizes as calculable

_classification.category: Requires build environment but hard to be dockerized
